mapper.select: /* 멘토 근무경력승인 목록조회 */ SELECT m.member_id AS mentorId, mwhd.mentor_POWK_NM AS mentorPowk, mwhd.mentor_career_apply_manager AS mentorYn, mwhd.FRST_REG_DT AS mentorDate FROM member m INNER join mentor_work_history_details mwhd on m.member_id=mwhd.member_id ORDER BY mwhd.FRST_REG_DT desc;

/* 멘토 프로젝트경력승인 목록조회 */
SELECT m.member_id AS mentorId, mtcd.mentor_project_NM AS mentorProjectNm, mtcd.TECH_career_DATA_REG_approval_manager AS mentorYn, mtcd.mentor_upload_career_file_date AS mentorDate from member m INNER join mentor_tech_career_detail mtcd on m.member_id=mtcd.mentor_id ORDER BY mtcd.mentor_upload_career_file_date DESC;

/* 멘토 학력승인 목록조회 */
SELECT m.member_id AS mentorId, mad.mentor_SCHL_NM AS mentorSchlnm, mad.mentor_CRTFCT_NM_approval_manager AS mentorYn, mad.mentor_upload_ACBG_file_date AS mentorDate FROM member m INNER join mentor_acbg_detail mad on m.member_id=mad.member_id ORDER BY mad.mentor_upload_ACBG_file_date DESC;
